reviewtext: After two years of continuous use I have had only one problemwith this product:  I neglected to increase the number of DHCPclients to the number of computers I was using. The router wasset to 3 and I had 4 computers, so one of them was alwaysfailing to connect. I simply connected to the router using abrowser and IP address 192.168.1.1 and increased the number ofDHCP clients. I have had no trouble at all after that.Update: after 5 years of continuous use the router failed.
